smile.math.kernel

Class LinearKernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.math.kernel.LinearKernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.function.ToDoubleBiFunction<double[],double[]>, Function, DotProductKernel, MercerKernel<double[]>

    public class LinearKernel
extends java.lang.Object
implements MercerKernel<double[]>, DotProductKernel
    The linear dot product kernel. When using a linear kernel, input space is identical to feature space.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
